title__all_platform_support_desc: No matter what platform you prefer, iOS, Android, macOS, Windows, Linux or even ChromeOS, we support it all.
title__bluetooth_battery_it_comes_with_i: Supports use with mobile apps, comes with a high-performance Bluetooth module and a slim battery so you can always be ready to go.
title__ultra_light_desc: At 5.2 mm thick and weighing only 20.5 g, it is so light that you can easily put it in your wallet.
title__ultra_security_desc: Travel around all blockchains with one wallet.
